subject: Re: Greetings
author: ppsmeet@verizon.net
full_text:
Sweet! Thanks Jim. I did the read directions, it was too easy. Didn't even have to put the screws back. Very low tech solution, just the way I like them. Do you know where the plan is for the more advanced model with connection for outputs, mic and headphones?

Thank you much

Mark
Phoenixville Paranormal
